context.p: installation flowInstalling StellarOne web console requires performing the following steps:

step.cmd: Deploy a StellarOne virtual machine based on VMware ESXi, VMware workstation, or Windows Hyper-V system.
Add an external hard disk with at least 50 GB of space to the StellarOne instance.
Log on StellarOne web console to set up the administrator's account.
Log on StellarOne web console to activate the product and set the time properties.
Configure settings such as IP address and communication ports.
